level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor shall, pursuant to subchapter 1 of Chapter 5 of Title 2, issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2(c) of Alternative Fuels of 1990 Temporary Amendment Act of 1992 (D.C. Law 9-232, March 17, 2003, law notification 40 DCR ).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-243, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-702.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-78, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-702.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-201, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-701.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Alternate Fuels Technology Act of 1990 Proposed Rules Disapproval Resolution of 1994: Pursuant to Resolution 10-259, effective January 14, 1995, the Council disapproved the proposed rules implementing the Alternative Fuels Technology Act of 1990.
